pageContext.claim: “The race for DNC Chairman was, of course, totally 'rigged.' Bernie's guy, like Bernie himself, never had a chance. Clinton demanded Perez!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump cites no evidence that the battle for Democratic National Committee chair, won narrowly by former Labor Secretary Tom Perez, was rigged. Indeed, there is no evidence and Sen. Bernie Sanders (D-Vt.), who backed Rep. Keith Ellison (D-Minn.), rejected Trump's claim. "No, he doesn't have a point," Sanders said when asked about the tweet.
